text: Fritz Sdunek (pronounced free-ts zdoo-neck, April 18, 1947 – December 22, 2014) was a German professional boxing trainer and former amateur boxer. Sdunek was one of the most successful and famous boxing trainers. He trained, among others, such world champions as Wladimir and Vitali Klitschko and Dariusz Michalczewski. He was born in Lüssow, Germany. Sdunek died in Hamburg on December 22, 2014, at the age of 67.Boxen: Trainer-Legende Fritz Sdunek ist tot Abgerufen am 22. Dezember 2014 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German boxers Category:Boxing coaches Category:Sportspeople from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
title: Fritz Sdunek
